Patient_sex.variable_description: Describes biological sex as recorded in the patient's identity document or in the hospital record. In the absence of documentation, the one declared by the patient will be recorded

Patient_race.variable_description: Describes race as recorded in  the hospital record, the one declared by the patient,, otherwise, the onerecognized by the observer

Patient_birthYear.variable_description: Year of birth of the patient.

Patient_countryOfResidence.variable_description: Country of residence at the time of diagnosis

Patient_smoking.variable_description: Describes tobacco smoker habits within the options proposed

Patient_cigarettesPackYearsSmokedDuringL.variable_name: Cigarettes pack years smoked during life
Patient_cigarettesPackYearsSmokedDuringL.variable_description: Calculates pack/ year by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes smoked per day by the number of years the person has been smoking.

Patient_alcohol.variable_description: Describes alcohol habits within the options proposed

Patient_height/weight.variable_description: Body Mass Index information if weight and height are included. it is calculated as BMI = kg/m2 where kg is a person's weight in kilograms and m2 is their height in metres squared.

Patient_charlsonComorbidityIndex.variable_description: Provides the Charlson Comorbidity index for the patient

Patient_comorbidity.variable_description:
Describes wherther the patient was diagnosed before treatment of at least one of the comorbidities listed or not. 
It refers to any disease or medical condition that is simultaneously present with the cancer under study.

Patient_myocardialInfarction.variable_description: Describes comorbidities reported or assesed before treatment. More than one choice is allowed. Please do not include the current cancer in this calculation, only the previous cancer.

Patient_congestiveHeartFailure.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Congestive heart failure

Patient_peripheralVascularDisease.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Peripheral vascular disease

Patient_cerebrovascularAccident.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Cerebrovascular accident  (except hemiplegia)

Patient_dementia.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Dementia

Patient_chronicPulmonaryDisease.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Chronic pulmonary disease

Patient_connectiveTissueDisease.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Connective tissue disease

Patient_ulcer.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Ulcer

Patient_mildLiverDisease.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Mild liver disease

Patient_moderateToSevereLiverDisease.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Moderate to severe liver disease

Patient_diabetes.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Diabetes (without complications)

Patient_diabetesWithEndOrganDamage.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Diabetes with end organ damage

Patient_hemiplegia.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Hemiplegia

Patient_moderateToSevereRenalDisease.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Moderate to severe renal disease

Patient_solidTumor.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Solid tumor (non metastatic)

Patient_metastaticSolidTumor.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Metastatic solid tumor

Patient_leukemia.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Leukemia

Patient_lymphoma.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Lymphoma

Patient_multipleMyeloma.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to Multiple myeloma

Patient_aids.variable_description: Previous cancer comorbidity related to AIDS

Patient_easternCooperativeOncologyGroupP.variable_name: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status (ECOG PS)  at diagnosis
Patient_easternCooperativeOncologyGroupP.variable_description: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status (ECOG PS)  at diagnosis

Patient_ecogPsLabel.variable_description: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status (ECOG PS)  at diagnosis

Patient_karnofsyIndexAtDiagnosis.variable_description: Karnofsy index at diagnosis. Consider only the first KI before any treatment available in the clinical record.

Patient_karnofsyIndexLabel.variable_description: Karnofsy index at diagnosis. Consider only the first KI before any treatment available in the clinical record.

Patient_noGeneticSyndrome.variable_description: If no genetic syndrome was identified for the patient. based on WHO 2020.

Patient_otherGeneticSyndrome.variable_description: If patient presents Other Genetic syndrome. According to WHO 2020

Patient_previousMalignantCancerSite.variable_description: Describes the site of the malignant tumour reported or assesed before the cancer under study. Any type of of solid and haematological cancer is listed. To obtain the previous malignant cancer refer to the solid tumor (metastatic and non-metastatic)  comorbidity

Patient_previousCancerTreatment.variable_description: Describes the type of treatment performed for the previous cancer

PatientFollowUp_statusOfPatientAtLastFol.variable_name: Status of patient at last follow-up
PatientFollowUp_statusOfPatientAtLastFol.variable_description: Describes the status at last follow-up

PatientFollowUp_statusOfDiseaseAtLastFol.variable_name: Status of patient at last follow-up
PatientFollowUp_statusOfDiseaseAtLastFol.variable_description: Describes the disease status at the last follow-up. This value is redundant as it could be derived from the disease status in EpisodeEvent. If a Patient has 3 follow-ups, but the disease status (e.g., stable disease) did not change during those, the follow-ups will be grouped into a single one with the last date of the three of them.

PatientFollowUp_newCancerDiagnosis.variable_description: identifies whether the patient has developed a subsequent primary cancer

PatientFollowUp_dateOfNewCancerDiagnosis.variable_description: date of subsequent primary cancer diagnosis

PatientFollowUp_newCancerTopography.variable_description: clarifies the site of the subsequent primary cancer (from a predefined list of sites)

Patient_lastContact.variable_description: Date of the last contact with the patient, of any kind.

HospitalData_hospitalName.variable_description: Hospital where the patients is included in the registry

HospitalPatientRecords_patient.variable_description: Patient element containing the data regarding the patient followed by the hospital

HospitalPatientRecords_hospital.variable_description: Hospital element containing the data regarding the patient followed by the hospital

HospitalPatientRecords_dateOfFirstContac.variable_name: Date of first contact with the hospital
HospitalPatientRecords_dateOfFirstContac.variable_description: Date of the first contact of the patient with the hospital registering the data. The hospital will record information on the patient's entire disease trajectory, thus also on procedures and/or  treatments performed in another hospital. The “date of first contact” will be crossed with other dates to better understand which parts of the disease path were managed by the hospital that registered the patient.

CancerEpisode_patient.variable_description: Patient element containing the data regarding the patient followed by the hospital

CancerEpisode_cancerStartDate.variable_description: Date when the cancer was detected. Must match the date of the first diagnosis. It works as the "overarching" episode

Diagnosis_cancerepisode.variable_description: CancerEpisode reference where the diagnosis was performed

Diagnosis_dateOfDiagnosis.variable_name: Date of diagnosis (biopsy or surgical piece)
Diagnosis_dateOfDiagnosis.variable_description: Date of the procedure performed to obtain the specimen for the histological diagnosis, regardless of the institution that performed it.

Diagnosis_typeOfBiopsy.variable_description: Type of biopsy performed to the patient. Information coming from the biopsy data.

Diagnosis_biopsyDoneBy.variable_description: Describes the institution where diagnostic procedure was performed. A pseudonym for a hospital. It could be the ID assigned from the original hospital.

Diagnosis_ageAtDiagnosis.variable_description: Age of the patient at the time of the diagnosis.

Diagnosis_radiotherapyInducedSarcoma.variable_description: radiotherapy induced if the new tumour is in the field or marginal  the anatomical area that received high radiation dose; please specify the interval time from the radiotherapy treatment

Diagnosis_biopsyGrading.variable_description: Grading of the cancer given by the biopsy

Diagnosis_histologyGroup.variable_description: HNC: Describes the histology of primary tumour according to WHO 2017 clasification.
values: Nuclear protein in testis associated carcinoma
Undifferentiated small round cell sarcomas of bone and soft tissue

Diagnosis_site.variable_description: Describes the primary tumor site. For head and neck, according to AJCC .

Diagnosis_histologySubgroup.variable_description: Histology subgroup value for the cancer diagnosis.
values: Human papillomavirus positive squamous cell carcinoma
Paget's disease, extramammary (except Paget's disease of bone)
Nuclear protein in testis associated carcinoma
Solitary fibrous tumor and hemangiopericytoma grade 1
Solitary fibrous tumor and hemangiopericytoma grade 2
Solitary fibrous tumor and hemangiopericytoma grade 3
Giant cell tumour of soft parts
Epithelioid smooth muscle tumor of uncertain malignant potential
Myxoid smooth muscle tumour of uncertain mailgnant potential
Melanotic malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor
Uterine tumour resembling ovarian sex cord tumour

Diagnosis_subsite.variable_description: Topography subsite value for the cancer diagnosis
values: Structure of superior wall of nasopharynx
Structure of posterior wall of nasopharynx
Structure of lateral wall of nasopharynx
Structure of anterior wall of nasopharynx
Structure of hypopharyngeal aspect of aryepiglottic fold
Structure of posterior wall of hypopharynx
Structure of anterior surface of epiglottis
Structure of lateral wall of oropharynx
Structure of posterior wall of oropharynx
Structure of inferior surface of tongue
Structure of anterior floor of mouth
Structure of lateral floor of mouth
Overlapping lesion of floor of mouth
Structure of retromolar area of mouth
Overlapping lesion of other and unspecified parts of mouth
Structure of vermilion border of upper lip
Structure of vermilion border of lower lip
Structure of vermilion border of lip
Structure of mucous membrane of upper lip
Structure of mucous membrane of lip
Structure of thoracolumbar region of back
Structure of thoracolumbar junction of vertebral column

Diagnosis_diagnosisCode.variable_description: Histology/Topography code combination for the cancer diagnosis

Diagnosis_tumorSize.variable_description: Describes the tumor size in CM. (the longest diameter; longest dimension between pre operatory imaging and pathological specimen) cm

Diagnosis_superficialDepth.variable_description: Provides the superficial depth of the tumour (for upper and lower limbs and superficial trunk)  superficial (superficial tumour is located exclusively above the investing fascia without invasion of the fascia), deep (deep tumour is located beneath or invade the investing fascia). All the others are deep by definition.

Diagnosis_deepDepth.variable_description: Provides the deep depth of the tumour (for upper and lower limbs and superficial trunk)  superficial (superficial tumour is located exclusively above the investing fascia without invasion of the fascia), deep (deep tumour is located beneath or invade the investing fascia). All the others are deep by definition

Diagnosis_biopsyMitoticCount.variable_description: Mitotic count reported from the biopsy (Number/10HPF/1mm2, 50HPF/5mm2). Reported as Number of mitoses per 10 high power fields.

Diagnosis_mitoticIndex.variable_description: Mitotic index derived from the mitotic count. Information coming from the biopsy and derived. M1 for less than 10HPF, M2 for range 10-20 HPF and M3 for greater than 20 HPF.

Diagnosis_plasmaticEbvDnaAtBaseline.variable_description: Describes the result of EBV DNA plasmatic test before treatment for Lymphoepithelial carcinoma, lymphoepithelioma like carcinoma (Nasal cavity and Paranasal Sinuses) or Nasopharynx

Diagnosis_hpvStatus.variable_description: Describes the result of HPV tumor tested in Nasal Cavity and Paranasal Sinuses, Nasopharnx or Oropharynx carcinoma

Diagnosis_crp\u2013CReactiveProteinTeste.variable_description: Describes the result of C reactive protein tested

ClinicalStage_diagnosisReference.variable_description: Diagnosis element containing the data regarding the patient's cancer

ClinicalStage_stagingProceduresDoneBy.variable_description: Describes the ID of the institution where staging procedure for primary tumour was performed

ClinicalStage_imagingForPrimarySite.variable_description: Defines whether any imaging study for primary site was performed or not

ClinicalStage_ctForPrimarySite.variable_description: Defines whether any CT scan for primary site was performed or not

ClinicalStage_mriForPrimarySite.variable_description: Defines whether any MRI for primary site was performed or not

ClinicalStage_usForPrimarySite.variable_description: Defines whether any US for primary site was performed or not

ClinicalStage_otherImagingForPrimarySite.variable_description: Provides any other value for imaging options for primary site
values: Positron emission tomography using other tracers

ClinicalStage_imagingForNeck.variable_description: Whether any imaging study for the neck was performed or not

ClinicalStage_ctForNeck.variable_description: Defines whether any CT scan for neck was performed or not

ClinicalStage_mriForNeck.variable_description: Defines whether any MRI for neck was performed or not

ClinicalStage_usForNeck.variable_description: Defines whether any US for neck was performed or not

ClinicalStage_otherImagingForNeck.variable_description: Provides any other value for imaging options for neck
values: Positron emission tomography using other tracers

ClinicalStage_imagingForMetastasis.variable_description: Wherther any imaging study for metastasis was performed or not

ClinicalStage_ctForMetastasis.variable_description: Defines whether any CT scan for metastasis was performed or not

ClinicalStage_mriForMetastasis.variable_description: Defines whether any MRI for metastasis was performed or not

ClinicalStage_usForMetastasis.variable_description: Defines whether any US for metastasis was performed or not

ClinicalStage_otherImagingForMetastasis.variable_description: Provides any other value for imaging options for metastasis
values: Positron emission tomography using other tracers

ClinicalStage_extraNodalExtension.variable_description: Describes the presence or absence of radiological signs of extracapsular extension, as defined in the AJCC 8th Ed

ClinicalStage_localised.variable_description: Describes if there disease is local

ClinicalStage_numberOfTumorNodules.variable_description: Indicates the number of tumor nodules in the case the disease is localised

ClinicalStage_locoRegional.variable_description: Indicates if the disease is in a loco-regional extent

ClinicalStage_isTransitMetastasisWithCli.variable_name: Is Transit metastasis with clinical confirmation
ClinicalStage_isTransitMetastasisWithCli.variable_description: Indicates spread of cancer cells through lymphatic vessels, where they lodge and grow in tissues located between the primary tumor and the nearest regional lymph nodes.

ClinicalStage_isMultifocalTumor.variable_description: Presence of multiple distinct tumor foci (or nodules) within the same organ or tissue, originating from the same primary tumor type. These foci may arise through independent tumorigenesis (multiple primary lesions) or local spread of the same cancer.

ClinicalStage_regionalNodalMetastases.variable_description: Describes if regional nodal mestastases happened

ClinicalStage_softTissue.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is soft tissue

ClinicalStage_distantLymphNode.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is dystan lymph node

ClinicalStage_lung.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease is lung

ClinicalStage_metastasisatbone.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is bone

ClinicalStage_liver.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is liver

ClinicalStage_pleura.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is pleura

ClinicalStage_peritoneum.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is peritoneum

ClinicalStage_brain.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is brain

ClinicalStage_otherViscera.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is other viscera

ClinicalStage_unknown.variable_description: Describes if site of metastasic disease  is unknown

PathologicalStage_sentinelNode.variable_description: Describes whether a sentinel node procedure was performed or not. Sentinel lymph node biopsy is considered a diagnostic procedure, therefore, per se, the neck is not considered to have been treated if it does not lead to a neck dissection.

These foci may arise through independent tumorigenesis (multiple primary lesions) or local spread of the same cancer.

GeneticTestExpression_diagnosisReference.variable_description: Diagnosis reference in case the treatment was done for baseline

Surgery_diagnosisReference.variable_description: Diagnosis reference in case the treatment was done for baseline

Surgery_episodeEvent.variable_description: EpisodeEvent element containing the data regarding the patient's cancer, in case the treatment was done for an episode event (progression, recurrence...)

Surgery_surgeryType.variable_description: Primary surgery/re-excision (check with unplanned or excisional biopsy)

Surgery_surgeryHospital.variable_description: Whether or not a surgical procedure was performed and whether it was performed at the registering hospital or another hospital. Diagnostic procedures (biopsy) are not included.

Surgery_dateOfSurgery.variable_description: Date of the surgery for primary tumor with or without neck surgery

Surgery_surgeryIntention.variable_description:
Palliative: surgery performed with the intent of improving quality of life or relieving symptoms caused by advanced disease.
Curative: surgery performed with the intend of oncologic cure, regardless of its result (R0 / R1/R2)

Surgery_typeOfSurgicalApproachOnTumour.variable_name: Type of surgical approach on Tumour
Surgery_typeOfSurgicalApproachOnTumour.variable_description: Describes the approach to tumor resection whether it includes skin incision (extenal or open ),  or it 's aproached through a natural orifice (Transnasal/transorbital/transoral) or if the approach combines two or more of the previous ones

Surgery_marginsAfterSurgery.variable_description:
The R0 (“no residual rumor”) category applies only to cases in which residual tumor cannot be detected by conventional diagnostic methods. A more exact definition would read “no detectable residual tumor.”This category corresponds to surgical resection for cure.
The R1 category is reserved exclusively for cases in which residual tumor is found by histologic examination. This category may apply to biopsy sampling of the regional tissue at the site of resection or of a distant site at the time of surgery. It also applies to microscopic examination of the resection margins of the surgical resection specimen by the pathologist.
R2 applies to cases with macroscopically visible residual tumor that is detected either clinically or pathologically.

Surgery_extraNodalExtension.variable_description: Describes the presence or absence of radiological signs of extracapsular extension by histopathologic examination or not, as defined in the AJCC 8th Ed. It's also present in the Clinical/Pathological stages for baseline diagnosis.

values: Number of mitoses per 10 high power fields

Surgery_surgicalSpecimenGradingOnlyInUnt.variable_name: Surgical specimen grading only in untreated tumours
Surgery_surgicalSpecimenGradingOnlyInUnt.variable_description: Provides the grading for surgical specimen only for untreated tumours

Surgery_reconstruction.variable_description: Local flap / regional pedicled flap / free flap

Surgery_neckSurgery.variable_description: Describes whether a surgical procedure to treat and address the neck was performed or not.

Surgery_dateOfNeckSurgery.variable_description: Date of the surgery on the neck

Surgery_lateralityOfTheDissection.variable_description:
Describes laterality of the neck surgical procedure: 
Ipsilateral when only  the neck ipsilateral to the tumor has been treated
Contralateral when only the neck contralateral to the tumor has been treated 
Bilateral: when both sides of the neck have been treated

Surgery_surgeryOnM.variable_description: Describes whether surgery is performed to treat the Metastasis

Surgery_dateOfSurgeryOnM.variable_description: Date of the surgery on the metastasis

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisSoftTis.variable_name: Site of surgery on metastasis_soft tissue
Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisSoftTis.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is soft tissue

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisDistant.variable_name: Site of surgery on metastasis_distant lymph nodes
Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisDistant.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is dystan lymph node

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisLung.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is lung

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisBone.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is bone

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisLiver.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is liver

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisPleura.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is pleura

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisPeriton.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is peritoneum

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisBrain.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is brain

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisOtherVi.variable_name: Site of surgery on metastasis_other viscera
Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisOtherVi.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is other viscera

Surgery_siteOfSurgeryOnMetastasisUnknown.variable_description: Describes if site of surgery on metastasis  is unknown

Surgery_surgicalComplications.variable_description: Describes presence and grade of complications after a surgical procedure,

SystemicTreatment_diagnosisReference.variable_description: Diagnosis reference in case the treatment was done for baseline

SystemicTreatment_episodeEvent.variable_description: EpisodeEvent element containing the data regarding the patient's cancer

SystemicTreatment_systemictreatmentHospi.variable_description: In which hospital was the SystemicTreatment performed

SystemicTreatment_typeOfSystemicTreatmen.variable_description: Select the type of systemic treatment administered. It is possible to directly select the single treatment as appropriate.

SystemicTreatment_intent.variable_description:
Clarifies the reasons why systemic therapy is administered
• Curative chemotherapy is chemotherapy administered with the goal of achieving a complete remission and preventing the recurrence of cancer. 
• Palliative chemotherapy refers to any chemotherapy administration that is not curative but administered simply to decrease tumor load and increase life expectancy. It has been defined also as “…treatment in circumstances where the impact of intervention is insufficient to result in major survival advantage, but does affect improvement in terms of tumor‐related symptoms…”

SystemicTreatment_setting.variable_description:
clarifies the context / how the therapy was administered alone or in conjunction with other treatments
• Neoadjuvant: treatment given as a first step to shrink a tumor before the main treatment, which is usually surgery, is given. Examples of neoadjuvant therapy include chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and hormone therapy. It is a type of induction therapy.
• Adjuvant: additional cancer treatment given after the primary treatment to lower the risk that the cancer will come back. Adjuvant therapy may include chemotherapy, radiation therapy, hormone therapy, targeted therapy, or biological therapy.
• Concomitant/concurrent: A treatment that is given at the same time as another (es. Chemotherapy and radiotherapy).

SystemicTreatment_numberOfCycles/Adminis.variable_description: clarifies how many times the treatment was administered. A cycle of treatment is a period of treatment followed by a period of rest (no treatment). For example, treatment given for one week followed by three weeks of rest is one cycle of treatment. A cycle can be repeated multiple times.

SystemicTreatment_regimen.variable_description: The regimen applied to the patient. If this is not present, or the specific regimen is not listed here, use the DrugsForTreatments entity.

SystemicTreatment_startDateRegimenChange.variable_description: specifies when the new systemic treatment begins, if a combination please specify the start of the first drug

SystemicTreatment_endDateRegimenChanged.variable_description: specifies when the new  systemic treatment ends,if a combination please specify the end of the last drug

SystemicTreatment_reasonForEndOfTreatmen.variable_description: Clarifies the reasons why the treatment ended or was interrupted

SystemicTreatment_treatmentResponse.variable_name: Treatment response (based on imaging alone; no recist or other criteria)
SystemicTreatment_treatmentResponse.variable_description: Measures how well a cancer patient responds to treatment. RECIST criteria should not be applied. The definition of Complete response; Partial response; Stable disease; Progression, should be based on the clinical judgement based on imaging.  Only when setting=neoadiuvant or  palliative

Radiotherapy_diagnosisReference.variable_description: Diagnosis reference in case the treatment was done for baseline

Radiotherapy_episodeEvent.variable_description: EpisodeEvent element containing the data regarding the patient's cancer

Radiotherapy_radiotherapyHospital.variable_description: Whether it was performed at the registering hospital or another hospital.

Radiotherapy_intent.variable_description: Radiotherapy intent refers to whether the intention of treatment is to cure the patient or to treat symptoms and palliate

Radiotherapy_setting.variable_description: Whether radiotherapy is delivered as the main treatment modality (definitive) or if it is delivered before or after another treatment such as surgery
values: Preoperative radiotherapy concomitant to systemic treatment
Definitive radiotherapy concomitant to systemic treatment

Radiotherapy_beamQuality.variable_description: Describes the type of radiation therapy given. If external beam, please specify if delivered with Photons (most common), electrons, carbon, or protons.
values: External beam radiation therapy using carbon ions

Radiotherapy_treatmentTechnique.variable_description: Refers to the type of radiotherapy treatment delivered
values: Ultra high dose rate radiotherapy (Flash therapy)

Radiotherapy_totalDoseGy.variable_description: Refers to the total dose delivered to the patient in Gy

Radiotherapy_totalHighDose.variable_description: Refers to the highest dose delivered to the patient. In a SIB boost and SEQ (only with a single beam) this varibale contains the same value of theTotal Dose. Value only expected for progression, recurrence...

Radiotherapy_numberOfFractions.variable_description: Refers to the total number of fractions delivered to the patient

Radiotherapy_adaptiveRt.variable_description: Refers to whether treatment planning was changed or adapted after the initial radiation plan was developed. This could be due to a change in the patient’s anatomy or if the tumor changed in size.

Radiotherapy_igrt.variable_description: Refers to whether image guided radiotherapy was used for delivery of radiotherapy and to check the patient set up. This includes MV, KV, or Cone Beam CT imaging.

Radiotherapy_reirradiation.variable_description: Whether the patient was re-irradiated loco-regionally. Value only expected for progression, recurrence...

Radiotherapy_fieldOfReIrradiation.variable_description: Specifes the reason for loco-regional re-irradiation. Value only expected for progression, recurrence...

Radiotherapy_startDate.variable_description: Date when  the first radiation treatment was delivered

Radiotherapy_endDate.variable_description: Date when the last radiation treatment ended

Radiotherapy_treatmentSitePrimaryAndIpsi.variable_name: Treatment site primary and ipsilateral neck
Radiotherapy_treatmentSitePrimaryAndIpsi.variable_description: Refers to the areas that the radiation is targeting. This could include the primary tumor , the neck lymph nodes, the ipsilateral neck and the primary, the bilateral neck and the primary, or a distant metastatic lesion

Radiotherapy_treatmentSitePrimaryAndBila.variable_name: Treatment site primary and bilateral neck
Radiotherapy_treatmentSitePrimaryAndBila.variable_description: Refers to the areas that the radiation is targeting. This could include the primary tumor , the neck lymph nodes, the ipsilateral neck and the primary, the bilateral neck and the primary, or a distant metastatic lesion

Radiotherapy_treatmentSiteDistantMetasta.variable_description: Designates which treatment sites were irradiated. Lung Vs Mediastinum Vs Bone Vs soft tissue vs liver Vs other.

Radiotherapy_metastaticTreatmentSiteLung.variable_description: Designates which treatment sites were irradiated. Lung Vs Mediastinum Vs Bone Vs soft tissue vs liver Vs other.

Radiotherapy_metastaticTreatmentSiteMedi.variable_description: Designates which treatment sites were irradiated. Lung Vs Mediastinum Vs Bone Vs soft tissue vs liver Vs other.

Radiotherapy_metastaticTreatmentSiteBone.variable_description: Designates which treatment sites were irradiated. Lung Vs Mediastinum Vs Bone Vs soft tissue vs liver Vs other.

Radiotherapy_metastaticTreatmentSiteSoft.variable_description: Designates which treatment sites were irradiated. Lung Vs Mediastinum Vs Bone Vs soft tissue vs liver Vs other.

Radiotherapy_metastaticTreatmentSiteLive.variable_description: Designates which treatment sites were irradiated. Lung Vs Mediastinum Vs Bone Vs soft tissue vs liver Vs other.

Radiotherapy_rtTreatmentCompletedAsPlann.variable_description: Refers to whether patient completed all treatment as planned or if it had to be interrupted due to several reasons including toxicity, a co-morbidity preventing the delivery of radiation (pulmonary embolism, failure to thrive during RT), death due to progression of the cancer or patient decision
values: Radiotherapy course change due to acute radiotherapy toxicity

Radiotherapy_regionalDeepHyperthemia.variable_description: Whether Regional Deep Hyperthemia was applied with the RT (information for Regional Deep Hyperthemia can be found in the specific entity)

Radiotherapy_treatmentResponse.variable_description: Clinical treatment response for the radiotherapy

OtherLocalTreatment_diagnosisReference.variable_description: Diagnosis reference in case the treatment was done for baseline

OtherLocalTreatment_episodeEvent.variable_description: EpisodeEvent element containing the data regarding the patient's cancer

OtherLocalTreatment_regionaldeephyperthe.variable_description: In which hospital was the Other Local Treatment performed

OtherLocalTreatment_treatmentResponse.variable_description: Measures how well a cancer patient responds to treatment. RECIST criteria should not be applied. The definition of Complete response; Partial response; Stable disease; Progression, should be based on the clinical judgement based on imaging.  Only when setting=neoadiuvant or  palliative

IsolatedLimbPerfusion_diagnosisReference.variable_description: Diagnosis reference in case the treatment was done for baseline

IsolatedLimbPerfusion_episodeEvent.variable_description: EpisodeEvent element containing the data regarding the patient's cancer

IsolatedLimbPerfusion_isolatedLimbPerfus.variable_description: In which hospital was the Isolated Limb perfusion performed

IsolatedLimbPerfusion_treatmentResponse.variable_description: Measures how well a cancer patient responds to treatment. RECIST criteria should not be applied. The definition of Complete response; Partial response; Stable disease; Progression, should be based on the clinical judgement based on imaging.  Only when setting=neoadiuvant or  palliative

DrugsForTreatments_systemicTreatment.variable_description: Systemic treatment reference that will apply the drug to the patient.

DrugsForTreatments_otherLocalTreatment.variable_description: RegionalDeepHyperthemia reference that will apply the drug to the patient.

DrugsForTreatments_isolatedLimbPerfusion.variable_description: Isolated Limb Perfusion reference that will apply the drug to the patient.

DrugsForTreatments_drug.variable_description: A list of drugs given to a patient for a specific treatment.

ClinicalStage_episodeEvent.variable_description: EpisodeEvent element containing the data regarding the patient's cancer

TreatmentResponse_overallTreatmentRespon.variable_name: Overall Treatment response (based on imaging alone; no recist or other criteria)
TreatmentResponse_overallTreatmentRespon.variable_description: It refers to the response to the entire therapy administered to the patient. It measures how well a cancer patient responds to treatment. RECIST criteria should not be applied. The definition of Complete response; Partial response; Stable disease; Progression, should be based on the clinical judgement based on imaging.
refers to whether overall treatment reponse was assessed at the registering hospital or another.

AdverseEvent_treatmentReference.variable_description: Treatment element containing the data regarding the specific treatment. It can be SystemicTreatment, Surgery, Radiotherapy, Isolated Limb Perfusion or Regional Deep Hyperthemia

AdverseEvent_adverseEventType.variable_description: the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE) is used to identify the adverse events. It includes details of the adverse event type and grade

AdverseEvent_adverseEventDuration.variable_description: specifies the duration of the adverse event
values: More than one week but less than a month
More than a month but less than 3 months
